byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: The settlement, one of the biggest recorded in Delaware's Court of Chancery, resolves one of the most publicly visible disputes over the financing that accompanies private equity deals.
snippet: The settlement, one of the biggest recorded in Delaware's Court of Chancery, resolves one of the most publicly visible disputes over the financing that accompanies private equity deals.

headline.main: Del Monte and Barclays Settle Investor Lawsuit for $89.4 Million
headline.print_headline: Del Monte and Barclays Settle Lawsuit for $89 Million
